quests.name: A Warm Welcome
objectives:
Gather the following Herbs in the Meadow and the Plaza:
  ‧ 3 Basil
  ‧ 3 Oregano
Talk to Goofy.
Cook a meal using Basil or Oregano.
Go back to Goofy with your meal.

quests.name: Photographic Memory
objectives:
Take photos of the following trees when they're full of Fruit:
  ‧ Apple Tree.
  ‧ Raspberry Bush.
  ‧ Banana Tree.
Talk to Goofy.

Take photos of the following in the Plaza and the Meadow:
  ‧ Squirrel.
  ‧ Rabbit.
Talk to Goofy.

Take photos of the following in the Plaza and the Meadow:
  ‧ Red Daisy
  ‧ Green Rising Penstemon
  ‧ White & Pink Falling Penstemon
  ‧ Dandelion
Return to Goofy to show him your photos!

quests.name: Dinner with a Friend
objectives:
Catch fresh Seafood with Goofy at the Beach:
  ‧ 2 Shrimp
  ‧ 2 Pick up Clam
  ‧ 2 Pick up Scallop
Talk to Goofy.
Cook 2 Bouillabaisse
Bring the 2 Bouillabaisse to Goofy.

quests.name: Photo Fervor
objectives:
Take photos of the following landmarks in Dreamlight Valley:
  ‧ The Swamp's Giant Willow Tree.
  ‧ The Plateau's Elephant Graveyard.
  ‧ Scrooge's Store.
  ‧ Remy's Restaurant.
  ‧ Dream Castle.
Talk to Goofy.

Take photos of the following Pillars in Dreamlight Valley:
  ‧ Pillar of Friendship (Peaceful Meadow).
  ‧ Pillar of Power (Dazzle Beach).
  ‧ Pillar of Courage (Forest of Valor).
  ‧ Pillar of Trust (Glade of Trust).
Talk to Goofy.
Put on a Hat for the photo.
Take a selfie with Goofy!
Show Goofy the Photo you've taken together.

quests.name: Scrapbook Blitz
objectives:
Take 6 pictures of Villagers, including Donald & Mickey
  ‧ Donald
  ‧ Mickey
Return to Goofy
Place the scrapbook in your favorite place in the Village.
Start the party with your Villagers!

quests.name: The Mysterious Wreck
objectives: You need to find someone who's good at fixing things.
Find the Mysterious Paddle on the Beach.
Talk to Goofy about the Wrecked Raft.

Gather the materials to repair the Wrecked Raft:
  ‧ 30 Hardwood
  ‧ 7 Rope
  ‧ 25 Clay
  ‧ 10 Iron Ingot
Talk to Goofy
Craft a Raft Repair Kit at a Crafting Station
Talk to Goofy.

quests.name: The Ones That Got Away
objectives:
Goofy must be fascinated by all the strange new fish around Eternity Isle!
  ‧ Talk to Goofy.

Catch some off the strange new fish around the Isle:
  ‧ 2 Dunebopper
  ‧ 2 Robot Fish
  ‧ 2 Prisma Shrimp
Bring everything you caught to Goofy.
Cook any meal using the Dunebopper, Robot Fish, or Prisma Shrimp.
Tell Goofy about what you made.
